title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: CSCL-Based Social Studies Collaborative Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can design CSCL scenarios reflecting student characteristics (background, learning style) using the HTN planning model.
Learners can construct and execute a structured task network for collaborative learning activities in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can analyze and improve the effectiveness of CSCL learning outcomes according to project-based assessment criteria.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
